meta.description: Optimize the number of small and large bins to maximize recycling material collection.

sets.name: BIN_TYPES
sets.description: Types of bins used for recycling collection.

params.name: workers_required
params.description: Number of workers required for each bin type.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each bin type in units of recycling material.

vars.name: num_bins
vars.description: Number of bins of each type to be used.

objective.name: max_total_recycling
objective.description: Maximize the total amount of recycling material collected.

constraints.name: worker_availability
constraints.description: Total workers used must not exceed available workers.

constraints.name: small_to_large_ratio
constraints.description: The number of small bins must be three times the number of large bins.

constraints.name: min_small_bins
constraints.description: There must be at least 10 small bins.

constraints.name: min_large_bins
constraints.description: There must be at least 4 large bins.
